author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Also cleaned up the NativeLinuxCommands.Tests.ps1 script on skipping tests

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/2095

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @anmenaga I was thinking that would be a good way for command discovery to find the "native command" and the powershell script to validate the command was executed over the script without polluting the current working directory.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Is this change only for Unix? The title seems so but the change is not guarded by `#if UNIX`.

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: @daxian-dbw The code is guarded  by a runtime Platform check.

title: put command discovery before scripts for Unix
